content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we're on the same page about the price. I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to secure the lowest possible price as a tenant. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
